price: 6. Naxariis ka ahaatay xagga Rabbigaa (Alle). Waa wax kasta Maqlaha, wax kasta Ogsoon.
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
